plot: An arrogant young preacher hears the word of God, and it's Orwellian. He rolls into a desert town with big plans, encounters a powerful shaman and a woman of elusive identities.
title: The Bodhisattva
plot_es: An arrogant young preacher hears the word of God, and it's Orwellian. He rolls into a desert town with big plans, encounters a powerful shaman and a woman of elusive identities.
plot_en: An arrogant young preacher hears the word of God, and it's Orwellian. He rolls into a desert town with big plans, encounters a powerful shaman and a woman of elusive identities.
